00029 class simbio_paging
00030 {
00041     public static function paging($int_all_recs_num, $int_recs_each_page, $int_pages_each_set = 10, $str_fragment = '', $str_target_frame = '_self')
00042     {
00043         // check for wrong arguments
00044         if ($int_recs_each_page > $int_all_recs_num) {
00045             return;
00046         }
00047 
00048         // total number of pages
00049         $_num_page_total = ceil($int_all_recs_num/$int_recs_each_page);
00050 
00051         if ($_num_page_total < 2) {
00052             return;
00053         }
00054 
00055         // total number of pager set
00056         $_pager_set_num = ceil($_num_page_total/$int_pages_each_set);
00057 
00058         // check the current page number
00059         if (isset($_GET['page']) AND $_GET['page'] > 1) {
00060             $_page = (integer)$_GET['page'];
00061         } else {$_page = 1;}
00062 
00063         // check the query string
00064         if (isset($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']) AND !empty($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'])) {
00065             parse_str($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'], $arr_query_var);
00066             // rebuild query str without "page" var
00067             $_query_str_page = '';
00068             foreach ($arr_query_var as $varname => $varvalue) {
00069                 if (is_string($varvalue)) {
00070                     $varvalue = urlencode($varvalue);
00071                     if ($varname != 'page') {
00072                         $_query_str_page .= $varname.'='.$varvalue.'&';
00073                     }
00074                 } else if (is_array($varvalue)) {
00075                     foreach ($varvalue as $e_val) {
00076                         if ($varname != 'page') {
00077                             $_query_str_page .= $varname.'[]='.$e_val.'&';
00078                         }
00079                     }
00080                 }
00081             }
00082             // append "page" var at the end
00083             $_query_str_page .= 'page=';
00084             // create full URL
00085             $_current_page = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_query_str_page;
00086         } else {
00087             $_current_page = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?page=';
00088         }
00089 
00090         // target frame
00091         $str_target_frame = 'target="'.$str_target_frame.'"';
00092 
00093         // init the return string
00094         $_buffer = '<span class="pagingList">';
00095         $_stopper = 1;
00096 
00097         // count the offset of paging
00098         if (($_page > 5) AND ($_page%5 == 1)) {
00099             $_lowest = $_page-5;
00100             if ($_page == $_lowest) {
00101                 $_pager_offset = $_lowest;
00102             } else {
00103                 $_pager_offset = $_page;
00104             }
00105         } else if (($_page > 5) AND (($_page*2)%5 == 0)) {
00106             $_lowest = $_page-5;
00107             $_pager_offset = $_lowest+1;
00108         } else if (($_page > 5) AND ($_page%5 > 1)) {
00109             $_rest = $_page%5;
00110             $_pager_offset = $_page-($_rest-1);
00111         } else {
00112             $_pager_offset = 1;
00113         }
00114 
00115         // Previous page link
00116     $_first = __('First Page');
00117 
00118     $_prev = __('Previous');
00119 
00120         if ($_page > 1) {
00121             $_buffer .= ' &nbsp;';
00122             $_buffer .= '<a href="'.$_current_page.(1).$str_fragment.'" '.$str_target_frame.'>'.$_first.'</a>&nbsp; '."\n";
00123             $_buffer .= ' &nbsp;';
00124             $_buffer .= '<a href="'.$_current_page.($_page-1).$str_fragment.'" '.$str_target_frame.'>'.$_prev.'</a>&nbsp; '."\n";
00125         }
00126 
00127         for ($p = $_pager_offset; ($p <= $_num_page_total) AND ($_stopper < $int_pages_each_set+1); $p++) {
00128             if ($p == $_page) {
00129                 $_buffer .= ' &nbsp;<b>'.$p.'</b>&nbsp; '."\n";
00130             } else {
00131                 $_buffer .= ' &nbsp;';
00132                 $_buffer .= '<a href="'.$_current_page.$p.$str_fragment.'" '.$str_target_frame.'>'.$p.'</a>&nbsp; '."\n";
00133             }
00134 
00135             $_stopper++;
00136         }
00137 
00138         // Next page link
00139     $_next = __('Next');
00140 
00141         if (($_pager_offset != $_num_page_total-4) AND ($_page != $_num_page_total)) {
00142             $_buffer .= ' &nbsp;';
00143             $_buffer .= '<a href="'.$_current_page.($_page+1).$str_fragment.'" '.$str_target_frame.'>'.$_next.'</a>&nbsp; '."\n";
00144         }
00145 
00146         // Last page link
00147     $_last = __('Last Page');
00148 
00149         if ($_page < $_num_page_total) {
00150             $_buffer .= ' &nbsp;';
00151             $_buffer .= '<a href="'.$_current_page.($_num_page_total).$str_fragment.'" '.$str_target_frame.'>'.$_last.'</a>&nbsp; '."\n";
00152         }
00153 
00154         $_buffer .= '</span>';
00155 
00156         return $_buffer;
00157     }
00158 }
00159
